website_summaries.verdict: The original “DMs,” these 10-eyelet lace-ups have become a classic combat boot.
pros: Signature air-cushioned soles keep feet comfortable all day
Supple leather means no break-in period needed
Sturdy construction and quality craftsmanship mean they're made to last
cons: Lacing them up can be time-consuming

customer_reviews.title: I went a size down and they fit great. I think the unisex sizing runs larger in ...
customer_reviews.text: For all of the people out there having trouble with Doc's sizing...for this particular pair/style, I went a size down and they fit great. I think the unisex sizing runs larger in the toe box. I am usually a women's regular width size 7 in just about everything. I ordered a 6 and they fit so well. I hope this helps some of you. Sharp, smooth leather. Takes a bit to break in, but so worth the wait and wear!
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: I didnt know you could love boots so much til i got these
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of docs and now im an absolute convert. I didnt know you could love boots so much til i got these. Break in time was about 2 weeks. Tip: tape the backs of your ankles with sports tape. Also, if the tops are tight where the tounge meets the toe seam, (which both mine were) then get a tennis ball for each shoe and wedge it in where the seam is. This will help stretch that area out. Do this overnights for the break in weeks. These are also true to size. I ended up needing an additional insole to reduce the roomy-ness that these were designed for. AWESOME boots. Accurate ship time too.
customer_reviews.author: Esther and yuri

customer_reviews.title: No more hobbling home!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I can't give these boots 5 stars is they were such a b**** to break in. They ripped the skin straight off the back of my heel for about 3 weeks until either my heels calloused over or the shoe finally gave in to my foot shape. That being said, I work in retail and stand/walk 9+ hours a day. These boots were just what the doc ordered! (get it? haha) And let it be known I have very flat feet and I'm usually in pain by the end of the day unless I'm wearing sneakers Added bonus, looking badass at work.
customer_reviews.author: Shashoushka

customer_reviews.title: Fit runs very large...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my usual size in Doc’s, UK5 and these things are huge! Ladies, I’d strongly suggest ordering one size down. These are great boots and I’m gifting them to my sister; and get a size smaller for me. Excellent service from this seller and will definitely order my next pair here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In 20 years of being a Doc Marten boot lover i've NEVER had a problem with them til getting these :(
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are my size, but they are extremely tight on the Right shoe only. I've been wearing/buying doc marten boots for 20 years and never had this problem before. There's nothing wrong with my right foot - but the Right boot has REFUSED to be stretched - i've tried the freezing bag of water inside FOUR times and the seam that constricts the middle of the shoe will not budge. Complete waste of money as these boots are gorgeous and the left boot fits perfectly. tried to contact the seller but could not. Boots are worthless with one being far too small/tight. :(:(:(
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lee

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little big
customer_reviews.text: Boots are a little big for an 8 but they are amazing quality and very comfortable. Since they don’t come in half sizes I’m not sure if the 7 would be too small. These are my first pair of doc martens and I would definitely recommend these. They are a classic and look, feel completely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. You just have to get through the first few days (don't wear them all day when you first get them!). Once you get through a few days they will conform to the shape of your foot and be so much more comfortable to wear. I've worn them extremely often in the year and a half I've had them and, except for a little wear and tear on the leather of the toe, they are still in perfect condition. I can tell these boots will last me many years.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of them. Bought them to wear at crime scenes, and I think they'll do the trick. I'll bump them up a star later based on how long it takes to break them in, because they are a little stiff and make it difficult to bend right now. As for size, I'm an 8.5-9 or so in womans, and I bought the 9. They're a pretty true 9, so there's a tiny bit of room but I think it'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Wyllloa

customer_reviews.title: same as picture but not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: it looks exactly as the picture but i was not impressed, the tops of the shoes hurt your legs and the material was thinner than original doc martins. to me it just felt cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Boots fit fine around my toes but did not fit around the ...
customer_reviews.text: Boots fit fine around my toes but did not fit well on the top of my foot. I couldn't get my foot in one of the boots and it was just too tight and painful to even put the other one on. I have a bruise on the top of my foot and I wore them for less than a minute. The shoe laces had nothing to do with my problem. I order a size 8 and I don't have large feet, and I noticed others had the same problem. My Dr. Martens were made in Thailand FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I found that thes fit just a little tight I ...
customer_reviews.text: I found that thes fit just a little tight I have worn them in the snow to break them in and have worn them all winter in Mn. but they are still a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: bet

customer_reviews.title: Run large
customer_reviews.text: Love the boot but they were to large,decided to go with a size down and added the platform for my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove. I usually where a 9-10 depending on the shoe. Got these in a 9 and they couldn't fit any better! Been breaking them in at work for 3-5 hour shifts daily, and I think it's the perfect amount of time without hurting my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Zee Rose

customer_reviews.title: Docs are timeless!
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes used to have a pair. I bought these for the durability and the foot/ankle support. Recovering from ankle avulsion and when I shed my third and last boot these will be my shoes for the next six months with jeans and dress! Only gave 4 stars because they are a bit narrow. I do not have a wide foot and tried them on with my good foot.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyforBoots

customer_reviews.title: The size was right, but it runs extremely tight ...
customer_reviews.text: The size was right, but it runs extremely tight on the instep part, which makes it impossible to wear because it hurts after just a few minues. The material is quite stiff as well (i know they take a while to break) and it is too shinny.
customer_reviews.author: Anet Melo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: First pair of Docs. Not only did I get them for a great deal here, they're true to size (in my opinion). Now that I've finally broke them in, if anything I would say MAYBE do a half-size down since they do stretch out, but ultimately they are very true to size, at least for me! Love them, gorgeous boots. The only thing is they didn't come with the yellow laces (I didn't want them anyways), but I guess since it's Amazon you can't expect the same exact details as the official Dr. Martens store. Packaging, tissue paper, and the show box are all legitimate Dr. Martens though :) My new favorite boot
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Dependable & Durable
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my daughter. She walks everywhere & destroys boots within a month or two. She liked the style & I knew from personal experience that these boots would not roll over & die a month after she got them. They are still in perfect condition after 6 months of continuous wear
customer_reviews.author: Kari E. Gronros

customer_reviews.title: In love with my 1490's
customer_reviews.text: Eeekkk! Just recieved my Dr. Martens. I love them! I order them on Friday afternoon and they arrived this Monday morning. I'm a size 5 womens US/ 3 UK they fit perfect. Only problem I have is they didn't come with the extra pair of yellow laces:/. Other than that, I cant wait to brake into these bad boys!:)
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Martens Rock!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Docs! Took me 2 days to break in, they're my favorites now! I gave 5 stars because of quality, but the finish of my boots seemed different than what the image photo shows. Photo was glossy leather, but my boots have a smooth satin finish. Maybe if I shine them up they will be glossy black? Will find out soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sonicpeace

customer_reviews.title: GREAT pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: GREAT pair of shoes, love them. it took me 5 days to break them in. I wore them with high thick socks 9 hours a day and now they fit perfect. I wear a size US 10 and got UK and I have wide feet, so don't worry if they felt sung at first from the top. the reason i dropped a star is when i received them they didn't have the extra pair of laces (the yellow one) or a shipping invoice, other than that the shoes are great.
customer_reviews.author: Hadir Karara

customer_reviews.title: The shoes were awesome, but I had to return them because the ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were awesome, but I had to return them because the sizing chart didn't accurately describe what size I needed. They were a size off (too large). But this was an Amazon issue, right? They provide the sizing chart.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: nice material, expensive looking
customer_reviews.text: the shoe is very well made. nice material, expensive looking, supportive, everything you would expect from a reputable brand. i just don't like how it looks so bulky. it also makes a squeaky noise whenever you take a step, which is kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love my Doc's!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Doc's! Always a perfect fit. Shipping time was amazing! I ordered them at 10pm Friday and they arrived Sunday afternoon- less than 40 hours after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tillery

customer_reviews.title: awesome deal!
customer_reviews.text: The fit on this was spot on. I usually get between a 9 and a 9 and a half in womens and i got a 9 in these. They definitely need wearing in, but once they are worn in, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Ejda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pair of boots and they hold up nicely. They run a little large, so try to expect that when you're buying. Otherwise, these boots are easy to break into and comfortable for wearing long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: 5 and perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I'm regularly a size 8.5 in shoes and 9 in running shoes. These are 8.5 and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Ill Fitting Docs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to replace my worn out, unknown vintage, 10 eyelet Docs. The leather uppers are nice, however, the fit is not. I ordered the UK 7 to match approximately US 9. They are an inch+ too long and much too narrow. Now I remember why I shouldn't order shoes online! Sadly must return these.
customer_reviews.author: Amber U

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Replaced my docs that are 26 years old. (I’m still wearing for bad weather ). Customer service was great and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very cool. They are very confortable and makes me feel tall around people that are really taller than me. The shipping is very fast. I recommend u buy these if you like Dr. Martens.
customer_reviews.author: meme

customer_reviews.title: I love my Dr
customer_reviews.text: I love my Dr. Martens, although the dang shoelaces started deteriorating after two months. I've had them for about a year now and they still squeak when I walk so that's kind of annoying. And they're not as durable as the company advertises them to be. They're really cool aesthetically though, I always get compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Saget

customer_reviews.title: Liking them so far.
customer_reviews.text: My feet are weird so I'm always nervous about buying shoes only. These shoes are really cool. Although the first time I wore them they rubbed the skin off my ankles. That's easily fixed by putting something in the backs of the shoes. I got a lot of compliments on them and plan to keep wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dean

customer_reviews.title: tight around the toes but once it stretches out its great
customer_reviews.text: when I got these I thought I would have to trade them in for a larger size. The top of my toes seemed really squished. But I took them to a shoe repair place instead and had them stretched out... now they fit perfectly... If I had gone with the bigger size they would have been way too big
customer_reviews.author: Emelia Engleman

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Doc's!
customer_reviews.text: Super Awesome Boots! A tad stiff, but to be expected. I'm having a great time breaking them in! Doc's run big, in my opinion, so the size 3 I purchased is perfect. I absolutely LOVE these boots! Looking forward to buying some more!
customer_reviews.author: Mum of Mr. Roona & Mittens Anne

customer_reviews.title: Just right..
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my 14 yr old daughter for her bday.. SHE LOVES THEM and all her friends are jealous. She said it took a few days to break them in, but LOVES them. I am thinking to get a pair for myself now. :)
customer_reviews.author: Danosmom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Classic boots! They take a LONG time to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: DM's are the toughest boots around
customer_reviews.text: I have been a devoted DM fan since I was 15 years old. I received my first pair for my first job and lived in them until I was 24 years old. I had to give them away because my feet grew half a size when I had my first child. These fit like every other pair I have ever owned. The top stitch across the bridge is always a bit tight so they will need a good stretch at the cobblers but the white leather is a bit softer than the oiled black so I think the breaking in period will be shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: 9 in boots and order de 6UK 8US and they fit great with thick socks
customer_reviews.text: Im 8.5 regular shoes, 9 in boots and order de 6UK 8US and they fit great with thick socks, run somewhat large.
customer_reviews.author: ASLR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dr. Martens always delivers! These boots are my daughter's new favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Even made in China....still good boots.
customer_reviews.text: Same good leather, same sole, same fit. 1. If you didn't size correctly, that's why your feet hurt. I've been wearing these since the 80s with no problems. Read the size chart. 2. Breaking in-Mink oil, mink oil, mink oil, saturate them every day. Wear them for an hour or so with socks to spare ankle chafing. Consciously make an effort to bend your instep and heel and keep them oiled. They'll be barefoot ready in no time. Don't blow extra money on their Balm, it's too expensive and a cheapo can of Kiwi mink oil will keep the leather soft and supple. Putting them near your heat vent in the winter helps too.
customer_reviews.author: DashOneCharlie

customer_reviews.title: Tough shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, heavy but comfortable. Never worry about kicking a rock as they will win!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: best
customer_reviews.text: I swear these are the best boots ever made. I love them. So comfortable & well made, they are my apocalypse/Walking Dead boots!
customer_reviews.author: lovbadger

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says the tongue is wonky (keeps moving over to the side). Otherwise, she loves these boots.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cugal

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: First real pair of Docs and they're awesome :). Good quality and extremely sturdy boot. They did cause some nasty blisters when first breaking but but they're perfect after that!
customer_reviews.author: tigerwannab3

customer_reviews.title: Good old Dr. Martens
customer_reviews.text: They fit just right, hold up to me wearing them in all sorts of perilous situations without giving me blisters, and just shine up so pretty. I want more pairs of these than my budget could ever support.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy S.

customer_reviews.title: Still in that process but so far so good. Haven't gotten any blisters yet
customer_reviews.text: First time owner of doc martens boots, these can be real stiff and will need quite a break in period. Still in that process but so far so good. Haven't gotten any blisters yet, maybe because of the thick socks I'm using.
customer_reviews.author: NY Nurse

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC CLASSIC!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these boots. I get compliments everywhere I go. I am sort of a preppy dresser and these boots have added a sexy dimension to my "preppiness". They fit great, were not hard to break in and are comfortable all day long!
customer_reviews.author: jennceee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I'm a true 8.5 in women's so I decided to go with a 9 because my feet are quite wide. They fit like a glove with a thick pair of socks and they're soooo comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: xVileNegressx

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Super nice quality. My niece is a size 6.5. For half sizes, order one size down. Material is naturally stiff, but will soften after you break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo74

customer_reviews.title: Petfect Doc's
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my Doc's. They fit perfectly & appear to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Connor

customer_reviews.title: STRETCHING is a must
customer_reviews.text: Sooo very happy with these boots! They really do need to be stretched. But once you do they are great!
customer_reviews.author: SilverMoonKitty

customer_reviews.title: holy crap do you have to break these in
customer_reviews.text: holy crap do you have to break these in. it took me maybe 2 months (and some really nasty blisters) to break these in, but now they fit perfectly and I can wear them all day with no problem. In fact, they're so comfortable I only rarely wear other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa S.

customer_reviews.title: in love!
customer_reviews.text: This pair I got to get beat up and scuffed up. I've only had them for a week, and they're almost completely broken in. They look badass and are comfortable enough to stand in all day. I'm sure I'll be buying a secondary pair, for "dress up" occasions
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: They aren't as uncomfortable as some people say
customer_reviews.text: They aren't as uncomfortable as some people say, I went to a concert right when I took them from the box and everything was okay! They are a little stiff at first I guess but not a big deal. Mine fit as expected and I love them ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Gisella Coto-Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Love Dr Martens and I know my size UK7 41 US9
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi_Chick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Wear daily! Thank you! Will buy again from you!
customer_reviews.author: nicole baker

customer_reviews.title: It's not them it's me
customer_reviews.text: The upper part of these boots is too high and not comfortable for me. I don't think it's a shoes fault but just my personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Agata Tajchert

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied Customer!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! Thank You. I liked them so well that I ordered another pair in a different color Definatly I would highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: But they are fine now. They accommodate my wide feet nicely
customer_reviews.text: They are tough on your ankles while your breaking them in. But they are fine now. They accommodate my wide feet nicely. Bear in mind, they might run a little wide if you have narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco Tripaldi

customer_reviews.title: look is weird
customer_reviews.text: its a nice material, got it fast but i dont like the look of it , its way too tight at the top for a girl it doesnt look nice,
customer_reviews.author: Yassy

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST, MOST COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST, MOST COMFORTABLE, MOST RELIABLE BOOT YOU WILL EVER PURCHASE!!! Sure it takes a few weeks to break these babies in but I wear them every day, I went on a 10 mile hike in them, I bike to school in them, and my feet are happy as clams at high tide. I have worn these boots every day for a year and they are NOT falling apart! They look as sturdy as the first day I got them! DOCS are the BEST boot I've ever worn. They're worth the extra money. AND THE VEGAN VERSION IS JUST AS GOOD AS THE LEATHER!!!! I LOVE YOU DR. MARTENNNNNSSSS
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: best thing i have bought from amazon
customer_reviews.text: totally recommend this, it is the best thing i got it online. The packaging was also good and perfect. I love the product and looking forward to order more in different colors.

customer_reviews.title: My everyday shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Dr. Marten's since I was younger and these are my favorites thus far!

customer_reviews.text: First class shoes,perfect fit and very comfort to walk. G.P Olafssson Iceland

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are fantastic! I am so happy that I finally bought ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are fantastic! I am so happy that I finally bought a pair of Doc Martens. As a lot of people have mentioned, they start a little tight over the top of the foot but once you have broken them in they fit beautifully.

customer_reviews.text: My daughter was happy with them. Just a bit big nothing that we needed to return. The material does look cheap.

customer_reviews.text: They are very good boots, and they fitted like I thought, even though they are for my daughter, we share sizes ♡

customer_reviews.title: Doc Martens are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome shoe. ...a classic doc marten. ...perfect in every way. ...I love this shoe. I want another prayer.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, comfortable, and badass. Can't wait for these to last the rest of my natural life.

customer_reviews.text: They are very cute. Combat styled, but left blisters on my feet the first day of wear. Will be perfect after killing me feet to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots are comfortable but the leather can be a little hard and requires some breaking in. I normally wear an 8.5 us and bought them in a uk 6 us 8 and they fit great. Overall I love them.

customer_reviews.title: DR. Martens For my daughter
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect. They were a gift for my daughter and she loved them. The price was good. I was glad I could get her something she really wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Love Docs
customer_reviews.text: Love my boots! Fits a little tight at first but I'm sure with wear they will stretch! Also got a blister on the back of my heel but they weren't tied tight. Came right on time and were exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: These boots have an artsy punk vibe and I love them. They're taking a bit of breaking in but they'll be perfect when I'm done!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi van Dyck

customer_reviews.title: You get so much value out of them
customer_reviews.text: Genuine leather boots The appearance of rough but soft on the inside Very comfortable to wear, and the appropriate size standard, I would recommend to friends

customer_reviews.title: Super cool boots!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 16 year old and she loves them!! Dr. Martens are the best! And the Jackson Pollack effect is spectacular!

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with my boots!
customer_reviews.text: And I'm not a shoe woman. These boots are everything I dreamed they would be. I'm breaking them in slowly but loving how my feet look all the while. One more thing. I'm a solid five and a half. I first went up a size. Wrong! These are a size smaller and are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli B.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great price
customer_reviews.text: At first i didn't expect them to fit, as they look narrow and my feet are a bit wide. But, they fit me well. I'm an 8.5, the are a 9b, I'm over all satisfied. I hope that that they last many years, as I have known them to...

customer_reviews.text: Love my Docs. They're great when I'm on my feet all day.

customer_reviews.title: ... put it on the first time but it seems like it will fit better after a while
customer_reviews.text: They are really hard to put it on the first time but it seems like it will fit better after a while. The shipping was way late it suppose to arrive at October 30th but I got them at November 2nd

customer_reviews.title: The absolute perfect boot. Essential to your wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: The absolute perfect boot. Essential to your wardrobe. A must have! Durable, well made. You will have this boot for years.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, mediocre fit
customer_reviews.text: I really love the boots! They're beautiful and unique. However, they kill my feet! These are simply too narrow for me and are going to require a lot of stretching out. I'm not sure if I will ever be able to make them comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: but great ahoea. I love them a lot
customer_reviews.text: They were just a little bigger than expected, but great ahoea. I love them a lot!

customer_reviews.text: Fashion and durable ! my wife is satisfied with it ! shoes leather feels so good! very well i love it

customer_reviews.text: Good quality,but too tight,very uncomfortable to walk. Even it was a right size. Wearing 7'5 usually. According to reviews,I ordered size 7,. Didn't work for me.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice but a little large sincer there are no half sizes

customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hot or cold weather, goes with everything and is even waterproof! I love my Doc Marten's, highly recommend them.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of docs, I originally purchased the 8 eye, and now the 10. I love these 10 eye, the height is perfect. I'm on my feet all day and wear these everyday. Very happy.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy....
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my new boots! Ive always wanted Doc's and I'm very pleased with my purchase. Yes they have to be broken in to mold to your feet, which for me was not bad at all... they are totally worth it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Rosie D

customer_reviews.title: I put them on and they were great. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to buy these because a lot of the reviews said they will hurt until you break them in. I have feet that usually do hurt so......I put them on and they were great. Very comfortable. I wore them with tights so the top would not rub on my leg so no problem there. They are awesome. I ordered another pair in a funky print. I love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived promptly in the mail. I couldn't wait to get the boots on! The breaking in process was a little painful but it's fairly normal with Docs. Now they fit like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Miller

customer_reviews.title: love how they look on my feet
customer_reviews.text: They came on time, love how they look on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Shamar Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm a US 8 and I had went with a UK 6. They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots but a little stiff i am breaking them in.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: beautiful boots
customer_reviews.text: It costs 12xxHKD, but only 800HKD including shipping in Amazon. Hopefully this boot arrived before the chinese new year. I can have this beautiful new boot for the new year!! Happy!!
customer_reviews.author: shirleyho6

customer_reviews.title: 10 Hole Dr. Marten Boots
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend said the Boots were what she expected them to be,,, Nice ;)) She was happy with the Purchase & would Go On-line again & View your Articles for Sale, Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Carl Schoder

customer_reviews.title: Do it...buy it!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! Quality is superb and will last for many years. Worth the purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No logo on boots
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited when I got the boots they was perfect. The noticed it didn't have a logo on the outside. I hope the next ones have a logo
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Marrow

product_meta.title: Dr. Martens Women's 1490 W 10 Eye Boot
product_meta.description: Dr. Martens is the stuff of legends. It all began near Munich, Germany in 1945 when Dr. Klaus Maertens injured his foot in a skiing accident in the Bavarian Alps. To make walking easier during the healing process, he designed a shoe with an air-cushioned sole. Using old rubber tires, he constructed soles that had air trapped within closed compartments. He showed his prototype to his engineer/inventor friend, Dr. Herbert Funck, and together they decided to develop and produce the shoes. Not only did the shoe solve the doctor's immediate problem, but it also started to sell well in Germany. By 1959 the two decided that they needed a company to produce and distribute the shoes, then called Dr. Maertens, in other parts of the world. At first, many manufacturers rejected the concept of an air cushioned sole as a short-lived gimmick. However, the R. Griggs Group, located in the village of Wollaston in England, decided to go along with the idea by creating the first work boot with the revolutionary sole. On the first of April 1960, the first cherry red eight-eyelet work boot was produced and named 1460. To sell the brand name better in England, the name was anglicized to Dr. Martens. The range was branded AirWair and the rest is history.
feature_bullets: Mid-high combat boot featuring ten-eyelet lacing and logoed heel loop
